MCQ: What is the central unifying theme that explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: Cell theory | c: Evolution | d: Homeostasis

MCQ: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic shared by all living organisms?
Choices: a: They are made of cells. | b: They process hereditary information. | c: They are capable of photosynthesis. | d: They regulate their internal environment.

MCQ: What is the approximate age of the oldest known life on Earth?
Choices: a: 1 billion years | b: 2.7 billion years | c: 3.7 billion years | d: 5 billion years

MCQ: Which of the following represents the correct order of the scientific method as used by biologists?
Choices: a: Observations, conclusions, hypotheses, experiments | b: Hypotheses, experiments, observations, conclusions | c: Observations, hypotheses, experiments, conclusions | d: Experiments, observations, hypotheses, conclusions

MCQ: Which of the following is NOT an example of a eukaryotic organism?
Choices: a: Bacteria | b: Fungi | c: Plants | d: Animals
